location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: A map of the Bahrain Island

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:460 x 1034 mm, on sheet 518 x 1054 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:An outline map of the Bahrain Island labelled ‘Map #2’ produced on 2 April 1933. Shows the Bahrain Petroleum Company’s roads, telephone and water lines, along with oil and water wells locations. Two locations added with a note ‘Subject to change’. Includes a key to symbols in the right centre of the map.Oriented with east to the top.
